The image appeared on Facebook on August: 2020, and was shared more than 370 times before it was deleted.
The post: s Indonesian-language caption translates to English as "La Vida en 2022," indicating the subject matter of the image.
The painting was created by Walter Molin: an Italian comic artist and illustrator born on November 5, 1915, and died on December 8, 1997. One of his works published in 1962 titled "La Vida en 2022" or "Life in 2022" gained attention from netizens.
The image was found to be an illustratio: la singoletta," a one-person transportation mode imagined by Molino in 1962, as explained in a blog post from 2014.
